To go on complaining about something, or a big freshwater fish that can live for nearly 50 years

Hellenic & Long Island Sound are 2 of these smaller groups of legislators that meet to promote a common agenda
A bent posture, or where Hannah & her besties sometimes hung out on "Girls"
Historians use "the   long 19th century" to refer to the 125-year period between the starts of these 2 European  cataclysms
clues.answer: the French Revolution & World War I

clues.text: India's Andhra people wanted their own state & have it, this one now about the size of Georgia

Buy the tot a plush baby JJ, a character from this YouTube show with a fruit in its name

It means eagerly hopeful or related to blood

How perfect that this word for a solid figure with 10 faces has 10 letters

For the title of a memoir, Gore Vidal used this fancy word for a manuscript in which layers of writing are superimposed
